azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" // VM 리소스만 필터링
| summarize total = count() by location
| extend region = case(
    location =~ "eastasia", "East Asia",
    location =~ "southeastasia", "Southeast Asia",
    location =~ "centralus", "Central US",
    location =~ "eastus", "East US",
    location =~ "eastus2", "East US 2",
    location =~ "westus", "West US",
    location =~ "westus2", "West US 2",
    location =~ "westcentralus", "West Central US",
    location =~ "northcentralus", "North Central US",
    location =~ "southcentralus", "South Central US",
    location =~ "northeurope", "North Europe",
    location =~ "westeurope", "West Europe",
    location =~ "australiaeast", "Australia East",
    location =~ "australiasoutheast", "Australia Southeast",
    location =~ "canadacentral", "Canada Central",
    location =~ "canadaeast", "Canada East",
    location =~ "uksouth", "UK South",
    location =~ "ukwest", "UK West",
    location =~ "koreacentral", "Korea Central",
    location =~ "koreasouth", "Korea South",
    location =~ "japaneast", "Japan East", // 추가된 지역
    "N/A")
| where region != "N/A" // N/A 값을 제외
| extend latitude = case(
    location =~ "eastasia", 22.267,        // East Asia
    location =~ "southeastasia", 1.283,    // Southeast Asia
    location =~ "centralus", 41.5908,     // Central US
    location =~ "eastus", 37.3719,        // East US
    location =~ "eastus2", 36.6681,       // East US 2
    location =~ "westus", 37.783,         // West US
    location =~ "westus2", 47.233,        // West US 2
    location =~ "westcentralus", 40.890,  // West Central US
    location =~ "northcentralus", 41.8819,// North Central US
    location =~ "southcentralus", 29.4167,// South Central US
    location =~ "northeurope", 53.3478,   // North Europe
    location =~ "westeurope", 52.3667,    // West Europe
    location =~ "australiaeast", -33.86,   // Australia East
    location =~ "australiasoutheast", -37.8136, // Australia Southeast
    location =~ "canadacentral", 43.653,  // Canada Central
    location =~ "canadaeast", 46.817,     // Canada East
    location =~ "uksouth", 50.941,        // UK South
    location =~ "ukwest", 53.427,         // UK West
    location =~ "koreacentral", 37.5665,  // Korea Central
    location =~ "koreasouth", 35.1796,    // Korea South
    location =~ "japaneast", 35.6895,     // 추가된 지역의 위도
    0.0)                                   // Default value if location not matched
| extend longitude = case(
    location =~ "eastasia", 114.188,      // East Asia
    location =~ "southeastasia", 103.833,  // Southeast Asia
    location =~ "centralus", -93.6208,    // Central US
    location =~ "eastus", -79.8164,       // East US
    location =~ "eastus2", -78.3889,      // East US 2
    location =~ "westus", -122.417,       // West US
    location =~ "westus2", -119.852,      // West US 2
    location =~ "westcentralus", -110.234, // West Central US
    location =~ "northcentralus", -87.6278,// North Central US
    location =~ "southcentralus", -98.5,  // South Central US
    location =~ "northeurope", -6.2597,   // North Europe
    location =~ "westeurope", 4.9,        // West Europe
    location =~ "australiaeast", 151.2094, // Australia East
    location =~ "australiasoutheast", 144.9631, // Australia Southeast
    location =~ "canadacentral", -79.383, // Canada Central
    location =~ "canadaeast", -71.217,    // Canada East
    location =~ "uksouth", -0.799,        // UK South
    location =~ "ukwest", -3.084,         // UK West
    location =~ "koreacentral", 126.9780, // Korea Central
    location =~ "koreasouth", 129.0756,   // Korea South
    location =~ "japaneast", 139.6917,    // 추가된 지역의 경도
    0.0)                                    // Default value if location not matched
| project total, region, latitude, longitude

Resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| summarize totalVMs = count()

Resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| project vmState = tostring(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.displayStatus)
| where vmState contains "VM running"
| summarize runningCount = count()

Resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| extend vmState = tostring(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.displayStatus)
| project vmState
| where vmState contains "VM deallocated"
| summarize deallocatedCount = count()

resources
| where (type =~ "microsoft.hybridcompute/machines" and kind =~ "AVS") or type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| mvexpand nic=properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaces
| project
    subscriptionId,
    name,
    powerState = coalesce(properties.powerState, properties.status.powerState, tostring(split(tolower(properties.extended.instanceView.powerState.code), "powerstate/")[1])),
    resourceGroup,
    location,
    vmSize = coalesce(tostring(properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize), '-'),
    os = case(
        properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType =~ 'Windows' or properties.osProfile.osType =~ 'Windows', 'Windows',
        properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType =~ 'Linux' or properties.osProfile.osType =~ 'Linux', 'Linux',
        '-'
    ),
    nicId = tostring(tolower(nic.id))
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle(
    resources
    | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces' 
    | extend ipConfigsCount=array_length(properties.ipConfigurations) 
    | mvexpand ipconfig=properties.ipConfigurations limit 400
    | parse kind=regex tostring(ipconfig.properties.subnet.id) with '/virtualNetworks/' virtualNetwork '/subnets/' subnet 
    | project
        nicId=tolower(id),
        publicIpId=tostring(ipconfig.properties.publicIPAddress.id),
        privateIPAddress=tostring(ipconfig.properties.privateIPAddress),
        virtualNetwork) on nicId
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (
    resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/publicipaddresses' 
    | project
        publicIpId=tostring(id),
        publicIpAddress=tostring(properties.ipAddress)) on publicIpId
| project-away nicId,nicId1,publicIpId,publicIpId1
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle(
    resourcecontainers
    | where type =~ "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"
    | project subscriptionName = name, subscriptionId) on subscriptionId 
| project-away subscriptionId, subscriptionId1
| project 
    subscriptionName,
    name,
    resourceGroup,
    location,
    powerState,
    virtualNetwork,
    publicIpAddress,
    privateIPAddress,
    vmSize,
    os
| order by subscriptionName, resourceGroup, name

Resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Compute/disks" // 디스크 리소스만 필터링
| extend diskState = tostring(properties.diskState) // 디스크 상태 추출
| summarize 
    unattachedDisks = countif(diskState == "Unattached"), // Unattached 상태 디스크 수
    otherDisks = countif(diskState in ("Attached", "Reserved")) // Attached 또는 Reserved 상태 디스크 수

resourcechanges
| where type == 'microsoft.resources/changes'
| extend timestamp = todatetime(properties.changeAttributes.timestamp),
    change_type = properties.changeType,
    resource = tostring(split(properties.targetResourceType, "/")[array_length(split(properties.targetResourceType, "/")) -1])
| where timestamp >= ago(24h) and change_type == "Create"
| where resource == "virtualmachines"  // VM만 필터링
| summarize create = count()

resourcechanges
| where type == 'microsoft.resources/changes'
| extend timestamp = todatetime(properties.changeAttributes.timestamp),
    change_type = properties.changeType,
    resource = tostring(split(properties.targetResourceType, "/")[array_length(split(properties.targetResourceType, "/")) -1])
| where timestamp >= ago(24h) and change_type == "Delete"
| where resource == "virtualmachines"  // VM만 필터링
| summarize delete = count()

resources
| where type contains 'publicIPAddresses' and isnotempty(properties.ipConfiguration.id) // Public IP가 연결된 경우
| extend associatedResourceId = tostring(properties.ipConfiguration.id) // 연결된 리소스 ID 추출
| where associatedResourceId contains "Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces" // 네트워크 인터페이스가 포함된 리소스만 필터링
| summarize totalIPCount = count()

resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets"
| where not(name has "aks" or name has "akswin") // 이름에 "aks" 또는 "akswin" 포함 제외
| where not(resourceGroup startswith "MC_") // MC_로 시작하는 리소스 그룹 제외
| where not(resourceGroup has "aks" or resourceGroup has "akswin" or resourceGroup has "aks-node-rg") // 추가 필터링
| project 
    scaleSetName = tostring(name), 
    resourceGroup = tostring(resourceGroup), 
    location = tostring(location), 
    skuName = tostring(sku.name),
    skuTier = tostring(sku.tier),
    capacity = toint(sku.capacity),
    orchestrationMode = tostring(properties.orchestrationMode),
    singlePlacementGroup = tostring(properties.singlePlacementGroup),
    upgradePolicy = tostring(properties.upgradePolicy.mode),
    timeCreated = todatetime(properties.timeCreated)
| limit 100

resourcechanges
| where type == 'microsoft.resources/changes'
| extend timestamp = todatetime(properties.changeAttributes.timestamp),
    change_type = properties.changeType,
    changed_by = properties.changeAttributes.changedBy,
    resource = tostring(split(properties.targetResourceType, "/")[array_length(split(properties.targetResourceType, "/")) -1]),
    resource_name = tostring(split(properties.targetResourceId, "/")[array_length(split(properties.targetResourceId, "/")) - 1]),
    resource_group = tostring(extract(@"resourceGroups\/([^\/]+)", 1, tostring(properties.targetResourceId)))  // `tostring()` 적용
| where resource == "virtualmachines"  // VM만 필터링
| where timestamp >= ago(24h) and change_type != "Update"
| project format_datetime(timestamp, 'yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss'), tostring(resource), tostring(resource_group), tostring(resource_name), tostring(changed_by), tostring(change_type)
| order by timestamp desc

resources
| where type =~ "Microsoft.Compute/disks"  // 디스크 리소스 필터링
| parse kind=regex managedBy with "/virtualMachines/" vmName  // VM 이름 추출
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle(
    resourcecontainers
    | where type =~ "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"  // 모든 구독을 가져오기
    | project subscriptionName = tostring(name), subscriptionId = tostring(subscriptionId)  // 구독 이름과 ID
) on subscriptionId  // 구독 ID로 조인
| project-away subscriptionId, subscriptionId1  // 불필요한 컬럼 제거
| extend 
    storageType = case(
        sku.name =~ "Premium_LRS", "Premium SSD",
        sku.name =~ "StandardSSD_LRS", "Standard SSD",
        sku.name =~ "Standard_LRS", "Standard HDD",
        "Unknown"
    ) // 스토리지 유형 매핑
| project 
    name = tostring(name),  // 디스크 이름
    vmName = coalesce(tostring(vmName), "Not Attached"),  // 연결된 VM 이름 (없으면 "Not Attached")
    status = tostring(properties.diskState),  // 디스크 상태
    diskSizeGB = toint(properties.diskSizeGB),  // 디스크 크기 (GB)
    storageType,  // 스토리지 유형
    location = tostring(location),  // 디스크 위치
    resourceGroup = tostring(resourceGroup),  // 리소스 그룹
    subscription = tostring(subscriptionName)  // 구독 이름
| order by name asc

list.label: resourceGroup
list.name: resourceGroup
list.regex:
Resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets"
| where name == "$vmss"  // 특정 VMSS 이름
| project resourceGroup

azureResourceGraph.query:
Resources
| where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets"  // 올바른 VMSS 타입
| where name == "$virtualmachinescalesets"  // 특정 VMSS 이름 필터링
| project subscriptionId
| join kind=inner (
    resourcecontainers
    | where type == "microsoft.resources/subscriptions"  // 구독 정보 가져오기
    | project subscriptionId, name
) on subscriptionId
| project subscriptionId, name  // 구독 ID와 이름 출력
